title: Reward for Helping
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Hnn~! So good-! I’ve always thought that shaved ice with Mikan syrup would be delicious~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Alright. It’s decided then, we’ll use Mikan syrup!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Man, the customers that come to your shop in summer have it good, Kanan-chan. They can eat this delicious shaved ice~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>I’ll treat you to one every time you come here, Chika♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eh!? Really!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Yeah. As thanks for helping me make the menu<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Yaay-! Then, then, I’ll bring frozen Mikan from home, so can I have it as a topping?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ah, that’s a good idea. I guess I’ll add some toppings to the ones we serve<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>S-, so luxurious-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Fufu. As a bonus, I’ll add condensed milk to yours, Chika!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
